attachments.title: Coding Adventure: Ant and Slime Simulations
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: Coding Adventure: Ant and Slime Simulations
attachments.video_html: <iframe width="400" height="225" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/X-iSQQgOd1A?feature=oembed&autoplay=1&iv_load_policy=3" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

text: That slime mold visualization is mesmerizing.

elements.text: That slime mold visualization is mesmerizing.

text: Just saw this pop up my Youtube feed. Love this person's work! All aspects were cool but my jaw dropped once the foam like structure emerged from the white circle of ants

elements.text: Just saw this pop up my Youtube feed. Love this person's work! All aspects were cool but my jaw dropped once the foam like structure emerged from the white circle of ants

text: I wonder how itd be possible to recreate/do something similar in Julia where the texture and agents are computed on the GPU using shaders
